Shivah/Kali

Shivah opened his commlink to Drillbit "Don't worry Drillbit, that 
gas is manipulated by Kali. My little sister is trying to... extract 
the spark of a traidor and Silverscout... " 

While Shivah said that, two slidder walls close the corritor behind 
and infront of Bullet and Razor Claws, trapped them while a sleep gas 
started to appear.

In other part Kali typed some buttons more and let two drones came in 
where Blaze and Silverscout where. The drones were equipped with a 
spark-extractor and a spark-cointainer. Each drone started to extract 
the spark of the femmes.

 
--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::KitKat2/DrillBit::
> 
> She turned to DrillBit.
> "Something is not right. Beast mode!" She transformed to her wolf 
mode.
> "I can small the scent of Foxfingers' friends, and... gas!"
> DrillBit smiled.
> "We must be knocking them out." Then the sound of the corrdor 
closing in
> could be heard.
> "Interesting," he said, as he opened a comm link. "Shivah, its 
DrillBit.
> What exactly is going on? KitKat can smell the intruders and gas. 
And we
> are hearing... well I dont know what we are hearing."
